title: DCOI Strategic Plan Schema version fy2019
description: Schema definition for the collection of the CFO Act agencies' DCOI Strategic Plans

optimizationMetrics.name: OptimizationMetrics
optimizationMetrics.title: Optimization metrics
optimizationMetrics.description: The set of DCOI optimization metrics

energyMetering.name: energyMetering
energyMetering.description: Targets for a given agency for each fiscal year in the facility utilization optimization metric
energyMetering.title: Energy Metering

fy19Planned.name: fy19Planned
fy19Planned.title: fy19Planned
fy19Planned.description: Value your agency plans to reach by the end of fiscal year 2019 in the given optimization metric.

fy20Planned.title: fy20Planned
